article: In the future, scientists would put very small computers in our heads. This can help people a lot.  Because of  these small computers, the people with ear diseases will be able to hear. And the people with eye diseases can  see  . These small computers will not be just for  _  people. Most of us will have these computers to make our life  _  . For example, if we have it, we can think  more clearly  and we can remember more things. For students, computers can do  lots of  things. Maybe in the near future students  will not need  schoolbags. They just need to carry a small computer to  _  , because the textbooks, exercise books, and notebooks are all in the computer. The teachers will check students' homework with computers,  too  . But this can give another problem, because  _  will be easier for students to copy each other's homework. Everything will be possible. We never know what will happen.
